<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2988</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Workshop on Antisemitism Using Statements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Seminar über Antisemitism mit Anweisungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Atelier sur l'Antisémitisme en utilisant des 
rapports</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Oficina em Antisemitism usando indicações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Workshop su Antisemitism usando le istruzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργαστήριο στον αντισημιτισμό που χρησιμοποιεί τις 
δηλώσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Taller sobre Antisemitism usando declaraciones</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson is based on ten statements, each relating to a different aspect of contemporary antisemitism. This activity provides an opportunity to stimulate discussion on various current issuesLessonplan and worksheet for students is available to download and print..</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">antisemitism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">racialism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion basiert auf 10 Anweisungen, jede in 
bezug auf ist einen anderen Aspekt des zeitgenössischen antisemitism.
Diese Aktivität liefert eine Gelegenheit, Diskussion auf 
verschiedenem aktuellem issuesLessonplan anzuregen und Bogen für 
Kursteilnehmer ist vorhanden zu downloaden und zu drucken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon est basée sur dix rapports, chacun 
concernant un aspect différent d'antisémitisme contemporain. 
Cette activité fournit une occasion de stimuler la discussion 
sur divers issuesLessonplan actuel et le tableau pour des étudiants 
est disponible pour télécharger et imprimer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição é baseada em dez indicações, cada 
uma que relaciona-se a um aspecto diferente do antisemitism 
contemporary. Esta atividade fornece uma oportunidade de 
estimular a discussão em vário issuesLessonplan atual e a folha para
estudantes está disponível download e imprimir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione è basata su dieci istruzione, 
ciascuno concernente una funzione differente del antisemitism 
contemporaneo. Questa attività fornisce un'occasione stimolare 
la discussione su vario issuesLessonplan corrente ed il foglio di 
lavoro per gli allievi è a disposizione trasferire e stampare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα είναι βασισμένο σε δέκα δηλώσεις, 
κάθε μια σχετικά με μια διαφορετική πτυχή του σύγχρονου 
αντισημιτισμού. Αυτή η δραστηριότητα παρέχει μια ευκαιρία 
να υποκινηθεί η συζήτηση σχετικά με διάφορα παρόντα 
issuesLessonplan και το φύλλο εργασίας για τους σπουδαστές 
είναι διαθέσιμο για να μεταφορτώσει και να τυπώσει ..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección se basa en diez declaraciones, cada 
uno referente a un diverso aspecto del antisemitism contemporáneo. 
Esta actividad proporciona a una oportunidad de estimular la 
discusión sobre vario issuesLessonplan actual y la hoja de trabajo 
para los estudiantes está disponible descargar y para imprimir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">antisemitism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">racialism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">antisémitisme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">racialism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">holocauste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">antisemitism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">racialism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">antisemitism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">racialism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντισημιτισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">racialism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ολοκαύτωμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">antisemitism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">racialism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
